item.description:
Can't make it all the way to Wakefield for Frank's viewing party at Harrington's?  Come down to Four Green Fields to root on the Patriots as they take on the Baltimore Ravens.

Join us again at Four Green Fields pub for our 4th football meetup there. Last time was a PARTY!

Four Green Fields has a huge 20 ft screen (the "biggest in Boston") and a 300 plus crowd capacity. Other places will be mobbed for this game, but this pub is new and we should be able to Meetup as well as watch the game.

http://fourgreenfields.com/homepage.php

This Meetup will be co-posted with Social Fun, Boston Happy Hour and Red Sox Natives!

We are getting to the pub early so we can find a place together & grab seats (MANAGEMENT IS GIVING US A "DESIGNATED AREA" there-- near the front) & get in some pre-game socializing!

Four Green Fields is located smack in the heart of Boston and the nearby T stop is State, on the Blue and Orange lines. Otherwise parking is available at the Pi Alley Garage on Washington St.

From State T station go to the corner of Washington St. on Court St. That's just past the old Court House. The facade of #1 Boston Place is a bank. Go around back on the left side to get to the pub entrance.

Please remember TAH TIP YAH SERVER! and maintain your own tab.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in my red throwback Welker jersey
item.name: Patriots AFC Championship Game -- Add'l Viewing Party
